item.title: What Does VP Care About?
item.description: Generation AI prospect The most important 3 keywords are: productivity, effiency and innovation . Routine works unioned step by steps can be replaced by AI. User to input commands in nature languages, then AI draft SQL, people only do manual validation. AI could save 50%(even more) effort. Business Value Ask PM or Customer for the business value. data engineer is to conduct whole life circle of data domain. Data is the air that ebay breathes.
